g.text: account: account1, pwd: xxx, site: random-site.our-dns-server.a.com
use this to update TXT record of
! NS and A record cannot both exist for 1 domain
ok, I will follow the CNAME
and NS for our-dns-server.a.com is our-dns-server.a.com
ok, I will ask our-dns-server.a.com for dns record
here is the cert for need-cert.a.com
